channel.title: I guess People on mopar never help
channel.description: How, and is it possible, to just open a server on my computer, and a client and edit it and figure out how everything works. I do not want to put it on the net, I just want it on my comp, so I can add stuff, and try stuff, and learn :p

item.title: I guess People on mopar never help
item.dc:creator: @DePredaTe DePredaTe
item.description:
@DePredaTe wrote:

Download something from the download section, http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,49.0.html

Put it inside a folder anywhere on your PC (C:\Program Files\MoparScape) imo, is the safest place so you don’t forget. Click the compile button, the the runserver. Open the client.java to edit server commands/make server commands, edit the server join messages, stuff like that. autospawn.cfg will edit all NPCs and monsters. Open MoparScape.jar and for the server IP type 127.0.0.1, enter ANY username and password but remember it. Goto your characters folder, find your account, edit Player Rights = 0, make the 0 a 3 Have fun.

Also, we do help around here. It’s just this question is asked so many times through out the day no one wants to help anymore. Just go to the tutorial section to look all this stuff up.

Read full topic
item.source: I guess People on mopar never help
